resources.string:
Thanks for updating!
New in version 1.6.0:
–Fix Appbar visibility setting
–Make links and mail clickable in about tab
–Add experimental dark mode (thanks to @marcomariani094)
Thanks for installing!\nJust connect your phone as you would on your computer.\nTo lock and unlock the keyboard, use the keyboard button top right. Your settings will be saved.

This app is in no way affiliated with WhatsApp Inc. The rights for WhatsApp and WhatsApp Web belong to WhatsApp Inc. This app is a private project to enable the use of WhatsApp Web on Android Devices
